Package de.db.derpate.servlet.filter

Interface ServletFilter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CSRFServletFilter, LoginServletFilter, ParameterValidationFilter
    public interface ServletFilter
    Interface used for ServletFilters, that are used in the FilterServlet.
    It cannot be used by the native filter servlet mechanism (for jsp), as it does not extend Filter.
    Author:
    MichelBlank

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean filter​(@NonNull javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req)
      Method, that returns if the filter applies.
      default int getErrorStatusCode()
      Returns the default status code (403}, which is responded, when a filter forbids a request.
      Can be overwritten.

    • Method Detail

      • filter

        boolean filter​(@NonNull javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req)
        Method, that returns if the filter applies.
        Parameters:
        req - the HttpServletRequest
        Returns:
        true, if request is valid;false, if request is missing required informations or is not valid

      • getErrorStatusCode

        default int getErrorStatusCode()
        Returns the default status code (403}, which is responded, when a filter forbids a request.
        Can be overwritten.
        Returns:
        http status code (int)
